headline: Netflix replaces Walt Disney as Top Pick at Morgan Stanley
summary: Investing.com -- Morgan Stanley has named Netflix (NASDAQ:NFLX) its new Top Pick in the Media & Entertainment sector, replacing Walt Disney (NYSE:DIS).

headline: Why Amazon is doubling down on movie theaters
summary: The Big Tech giant is trading instant streams for theatrical prestige, rolling out a studio-size release schedule to win hearts—and maybe Oscars—before views.
